parkingRobot

Interface IControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControlRST

    public interface IControl
    interface for the main module 'Control', providing methods for executing the algorithms to control the robot according to different modes which is set by guidance.
    Author:
    RST

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IControl.ControlMode
      The predefined control modes

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exec_CTRL_ALGO()
      execute the selected algorithms for control which was set by guidance

      set the required angular velocity
      void setCtrlMode(IControl.ControlMode ctrl_mode)
      set the current control mode
      void setDestination(double heading, double x, double y)
      set the destination to be driven to
      void setPose(Pose currentPosition)
      the Robot's current position
      void setStartTime(int startTime)
      set start time
      void setVelocity(double velocity)
      set the required speed

    • Method Detail

      • exec_CTRL_ALGO

        void exec_CTRL_ALGO()
        execute the selected algorithms for control which was set by guidance

      • setAngularVelocity

        void setAngularVelocity(double angularVelocity)
        set the required angular velocity
        Parameters:
        angularVelocity - the angular velocity to be set

      • setCtrlMode

        void setCtrlMode(IControl.ControlMode ctrl_mode)
        set the current control mode
        Parameters:
        ctrl_mode - parameter for control mode which is defined by Guidance

      • setDestination

        void setDestination(double heading,
                  double x,
                  double y)
        set the destination to be driven to
        Parameters:
        heading - the heading angle of the robot at the destination
        x - the destination position in x axis
        y - the destination position in y axis

      • setPose

        the Robot's current position
        Parameters:
        currentPosition - the current position of the robot at each sampling
